title: Friend got banned and it may have been my fault
body: We were in a game as a 4 man and the enemy team went for a dive bot and my friend dodge some things and then got accused of being a scripter. Then throughout the night every time he dodged or ran into a skillshot we would say in allchat "nice scripts" or "he turned off his scripts so you could hit that." Today he tried to log on and his account had been suspended for using 3rd party programs. It's really shitty actually that just because the enemy team is losing they have to make up the excuse of someone cheating just because someone is better than them. We were just joking around and then it actually happened and I dont know what to do other than have him submit a ticket and post here.

replies.body:
Just to clear this up real quick:
1. You were both banned for using the exact same scripting application.
2. MKLoL hasn't been thing for nearly a year, and no support agent ever referenced it.
3. We don't derive cheating suspensions from game chats, that is seriously ridiculous. 
4. The enemy team probably accused you of scripting because you were scripting.

While it's admittedly kinda adorable that you both ended up in the same banwave, I couldn't even begin to guess at what you hoped to accomplish with this thread.  I'd strongly suggest a different video game if you need cheats to play this one.

Godspeed.

> [{quoted}](name=mirageofpenguins,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=PuvAvtnP,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2017-04-26T01:03:14.521+0000)
>
> Just to clear this up real quick:
> 1. You were both banned for using the exact same scripting application.
> 2. MKLoL hasn't been thing for nearly a year, and no support agent ever referenced it.
> 3. We don't derive cheating suspensions from game chats, that is seriously ridiculous. 
> 4. The enemy team probably accused you of scripting because you were scripting.
> 
> While it's admittedly kinda adorable that you both ended up in the same banwave, I couldn't even begin to guess at what you hoped to accomplish with this thread.  I'd strongly suggest a different video game if you need cheats to play this one.
> 
> Godspeed.

Hello good sir. While I recognize you are a rioter, you should also realize that you don't read our personal support tickets. I got unbanned as of 2 hours ago because your automatic system made a mistake and you have no right to accuse us of cheating when we haven't. Thanks ahead for the apology because I probably won't be back on the forums unless another "mistake" happens. Have a blessed evening. :))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))
Sure you did. Screenshots?

> [{quoted}](name=BeatzBoyFTW,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=PuvAvtnP,comment-id=000700010000,timestamp=2017-04-26T02:10:35.375+0000)
>
> Sure you did. Screenshots?

http://prntscr.com/f0vnsa Do you want to continue being ignorant or do you wanna stop now?
Well, that was the rarest thing to see around here nowadays. Congrats.

> [{quoted}](name=BeatzBoyFTW,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=PuvAvtnP,comment-id=00070001000000000000,timestamp=2017-04-26T02:18:34.834+0000)
>
> Well, that was the rarest thing to see around here nowadays. Congrats.

Happens when an automatic system isn't correctly programmed.

You're misreading the reply:

> After taking a deeper look at your case I have gone ahead and removed the permaban at this time ***due to the strange activity that I saw on the account.***
>
> However, ***I would use this as a learning experience and make sure that you keep your account secure so that this doesn't happen again in the future. Remember, as the account owner you still accountable for actions that occur on your account during all games***...

AKA: They saw someone else logged into your account and used scripts, but the automated system correctly identified scripts.
This is correct, thank you.
But still, I highly recommend that you reset your password anyway for security measures.
Not often you see a Rioter getting smited. Hah.
{{summoner:14}} {{summoner:11}}
I get that this guy is a Rioter but that's a pretty dick comment, I mean, they might as well have posted a picture of them giving the finger holding up a sign that says "Fuck You!" in bright red ink.
Hey Mirageofpenguins. Is there any way to get in contact with you? I have some concerns regarding my account.

They can't ban for scripting based purely on things said in chat. That's fucked up. I can say whatever i want in chat (well.. as long as it's not toxic). "I'm trolling", "I'm scripting", "I'm boosted" ...It doesn't mean I'm actually doing any of those things. And if I do say that ever, it's because I'm mocking someone who accused me of doing that.

Well, I think I found your problem. MKLoL is not an acceptable application for use with League of Legends, as certain functions violate the League of Legends Terms of Use. You can read more about it here:

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/5dmkJinG-3rd-party-applicationsmodifications-whats-allowed-and-what-isnt
MKLoL is not acceptable cause it gives free access to original skins made by Riot. With wooxy it's other thing cause you install custom skins that are fanmade, thus they do not belong to Riot.
That's not the reasoning behind the prohibition of MKLoL. This application has functionality that automates certain aspects of the game, mostly with regards to timers, and that's a bit no-no.
Your friend should definitely submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if he doesn't understand what his ban was for.
Why is your name blue I want my name to be blue

If you hold your breath long enough it'll happen naturally. You can also just be a positive, well informed, and helpful players on the PB&M boards and if we're looking for more Arbiters we'll be on the prowl for potential candidates! (there's no signup)

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/opVBd7rZ-introducing-the-arbiters

+Deep Terror Nami
are toxic players (formerly) able to become arbiters?
Reform and we'll see.

and does phreak happen to be in player support?
i gotta find his ass and make him apologize to tyler1

For?

lmao hes reformed he dont deserve nothing

like #FREETYLER1 ?

So I can either be a good person or drown myself

Sorry, it's too early for good jokes.
Submitted, thank you.

You do realize I don't know this guy irl. He is a someone who I've been playing with on discord for a week. I got unbanned because my personal computer has nothing on it that would cause a ban to be issued. And I only play on my personal conputer. I pretty much take it everywhere so that's another thing.

So my theory is that one day he got on his friends computer to play the game (Assuming they live in the same area). Even if he didn't use the scripts himself, the system detected his account now being associated with the files of a modified client.  Resulting in getting hit with the ban wave.

Otherwise, yeah... secure your account and check the list of okay'd program that a red has actually made.
Is Pichu still banned?

>

Yes, a permaban for his first offense of any kind for using a 3rd party program that changes in game skin and has nothing to do with any competitive advantage at all. Seems legit right?
yupp
nice name there. hope you can get this resolved.
I appreciate your concern, one can only hope at this point.

scripts are usually fairly obvious

like sweeping a bush to make sure there is no ward in it and then they manage to land skill shots on you again and again and again no matter where in the bush you are even when you use a dash ability right b4 their ability is off CD (i fought an ez that never missed a Q or R (for that death by recall ult even if the person delayed recalling after dropping vision and being 100% sure there was no vision because of control wards in bush) regardless of vision and never got hit by a skill shot

usually its obvious, especially when they are vs skill shot or stealth champions if they manage to dodge a ziggs, thresh and cho using their skill shots at the same time in different sports but all right on someone its a bit fishy

I get hit with skillshots all the time, and I miss them all the time. There is no real reason for them to suspect me of scripting. If I land a base ult, so what? It's as simple as knowing and understanding what you can and can't land.

Wuks. Would there be a chance that I got falsely banned because we were in a group and they mass reported all of us? I already sent a ticket but I don't have any 3rd party programs except for overwolf and plays.tv.
And I just got my account banned for 3rd party applications and I don't use anything 3rd party stuff except overwolf and plays.tv
They responded, and I was permanently suspended for MK LOL and they aren't reversing it.
